description: This is a Kotlin source file defining an Android Fragment (CartFragment) that manages the shopping cart UI, including item list display, promo code application/removal, and totals calculation/rendering.

classes.name: CartFragment
classes.description: An Android Fragment responsible for displaying and managing the shopping cart interface, including item list management, promo code handling, and totals display.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the CartAdapter with callbacks for item quantity modifications and removal.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment's layout from XML.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Binds UI elements, sets up RecyclerView, button click handlers, and observers for cart data and UI updates.

methods.name: renderTotals
methods.description: Updates the UI with the latest cart totals, including subtotal, discount, delivery, tax, and total.
